description:
A full-featured desktop app for DevDocs.io.

DevDocs.io combines multiple API documentations in a fast, organized, and searchable interface.
This is an unofficial desktop app for it.
Changes
- Upgraded to Electron 12, so it could run on Mac M1.
- Now the Mac app is not signed due to that my mac app developer program has expired and I've no intention to renew it (which costs $99/y)
Install
- macOS
- Windows
- Installer
- Portable
- Linux
- AppImage (Recommended)
- deb
